All the JSON files are written to the js: All the JSON files are written to the jsonManifests folder. They follow the illustrated format:
In other cases, if a mistake is made edi: In other cases, if a mistake is made editing the PatternConfig.json file, the plugin will replace it with the default file, and the user will have to start over.
In some cases the plugin might crash. If: In some cases the plugin might crash. If that happens, press the 'Restart from PatternConfig Backup" button and the plugin will use the last good PatternConfig.json file as a new starting off point.
